name: Shoot n Fire
description:
Controls

- Use Arrow keys or A and D to point the shooter

- Point toward down to jump

- Press Space or Click mouse  to Shoot

- Watch out there is an UFO up there

Credits

Art, music is by me, code for score counter by griffpatch so 95% code by me

I made this with Scratch, my dad help me to upload this game to itch.io
